page.title: 06Produce Show At Notgrove
page.content: Every August Bank Holiday Monday the Annual Notgrove and District Produce Show takes place in the village hall. In 1985 the number of entries and visitors were up on the previous year, which well pleased the organisers. The format for the Show follows the usual classes of entries in this type of local Produce Show. There are fruit, vegetable, flowers, preserves, wine and confectionery classes as well as hadicraft, photography and hobbies sections. The children are encouraged with special cups for their exhibits. A Show such as this helps encourage a standard of excellence in these vital homecraft skills, as well as being a social occasion in a small close knit community. The childrens classes help to perpetuate this continuance of skills.
